item.title: Case 155 help PLEASE! **STILL NOT FIXED**PLEASE HELP ME**
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[code=java]case 155:

	if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop
		PutNPCCoords = true;
		WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop
	}
	if (WanneShop > 0) {
		if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, 1) == true) {
			openUpShop(WanneShop);
			WanneShop = 0;
		}
	}

break;
public void openUpShop(int ShopID) {
sendFrame126(server.shopHandler.ShopName[ShopID], 3901);
sendFrame248(3824, 3822);
resetItems(3823);
resetShop(ShopID);
IsShopping = true;
MyShopID = ShopID;
} [/code]
^
